snippet.title: Knights in Tight Spaces | Future Games Show Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Control your environment, gather your party, and build your best deck to overcome outlaws and supernatural forces, across a rich fantasy world.

From the developers of Fights in Tight Spaces comes a new, standalone title that sends us back to medieval times, building on the much-loved gameplay in new and dynamic ways, while maintaining the same stylish look-and-feel and thrilling animated fight sequences. 

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2315400/Knights_in_Tight_Spaces
